text:
Deepika Padukone is one lucky girl! After all, she is married to the man of every woman’s dream – Ranveer Singh. After a heartbreak that turned into depression, she has finally found the love of her life. By just seeing the way Ranveer Singh looks at Deepika Padukone, we want to give him the title of the best husband!
Ranveer Singh is the most sought after and bankable actors in the industry. From playing a serious role like Khilji to going all mad in Simmba, he has proved his mettle as an actor. In his next, Gully Boy, he is playing an underground rapper, and fans are already showering praises upon him. Is there something he can’t do? We doubt!
PTI
But did you know that rumours are afloat that Ranveer Singh’s father paid Rs 10 lakh to Aditya Chopra for his debut? Rubbishing the rumours and revealing how deeply that hurt him, here’s what Ranveer Singh said on Famously Filmfare.
“There were rumours that my father gave Rs 10 lakh to Aditya Chopra, to get me launched. That really hurt me, it brought my whole upbringing into question. How can you write something so false that I had never said? I had genuinely struggled and proud of what I achieved. Young actors will message me and ask, ‘Yo bro, I can cough up the money, tell me what I have to do.’ And I have to say that these rumours are not true, stop believing that!”
